, '$usedLanguage$' as usedLanguage FROM searchtmp INNER JOIN mediaobject ON searchtmp.ivid = mediaobject.ivid WHERE suid = #suid# ORDER BY photographdate DESC, imagenumber ASC
LIMIT #startItem#,#itemCount#
sqlMap.update:
INSERT INTO searchtmp SELECT DISTINCT null as stid, #suid# as suid, mediaobject.ivid as ivid, now() as searchtime, (0 + ((MATCH(versionsubtitlelng1,versionsubtitlelng2,versiontitlelng1,versiontitlelng2,keywords,byline,sitelng1,sitelng2,infolng1,infolng2,people) AGAINST (#keywords# IN BOOLEAN MODE))) ) as score
FROM aclimage INNER JOIN mediaobject on aclimage.ivid = mediaobject.ivid AND ((aclimage.principalid = #groupPrincipal# AND aclimage.principaltype = 1) OR (aclimage.principalid = #userPrincipal# AND aclimage.principaltype = 2))
FROM mediaobject
WHERE MATCH(versionsubtitlelng1,versionsubtitlelng2,versiontitlelng1,versiontitlelng2,keywords,byline,sitelng1,sitelng2,infolng1,infolng2,people) AGAINST (#keywords# IN BOOLEAN MODE)

INSERT INTO searchtmp SELECT null as stid, #suid# as suid, mediaobject.ivid as ivid, now() as searchtime, 1 as score FROM mediaobject LEFT OUTER JOIN categoryholder ON categoryholder.ivid = mediaobject.ivid LEFT OUTER JOIN folderholder ON folderholder.ivid = mediaobject.ivid LEFT OUTER JOIN pinpicholder ON pinpicholder.ivid = mediaobject.ivid LEFT OUTER JOIN inbox ON inbox.ivid = mediaobject.ivid WHERE fhid IS NULL AND chid IS NULL AND phid IS NULL AND inboxid IS NULL

INSERT INTO searchtmp SELECT DISTINCT null as stid, #suid# as suid, mediaobject.ivid as ivid, now() as searchtime, ( 0
+ MATCH(site) AGAINST (#site# IN BOOLEAN MODE)
+ MATCH(people) AGAINST (#people# IN BOOLEAN MODE)
+ ((MATCH(versionsubtitlelng1,versionsubtitlelng2,versiontitlelng1,versiontitlelng2,keywords,byline,sitelng1,sitelng2,infolng1,infolng2,people) AGAINST (#keywords# IN BOOLEAN MODE)))
) as score
FROM aclimage INNER JOIN mediaobject on aclimage.ivid = mediaobject.ivid AND ((aclimage.principalid = #groupPrincipal# AND aclimage.principaltype = 1) OR (aclimage.principalid = #userPrincipal# AND aclimage.principaltype = 2))
FROM mediaobject
WHERE ( 1 = 1
AND ( MATCH(versionsubtitlelng1,versionsubtitlelng2,versiontitlelng1,versiontitlelng2,keywords,byline,sitelng1,sitelng2,infolng1,infolng2,people) AGAINST (#keywords# IN BOOLEAN MODE) )
AND MATCH(sitelng1,sitelng2) AGAINST (#site# IN BOOLEAN MODE)
AND MATCH(people) AGAINST (#people# IN BOOLEAN MODE)
)
AND (DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL $periodInterval$) < photographDate)
AND orientation = #orientation#
AND photographeralias LIKE #photographerAlias#
AND perspective = #perspective#
AND motive = #motive#
AND gesture = #gesture#
AND customlist1 = #customList1#
AND customlist2 = #customList2#
AND customlist3 = #customList3#
AND photographdate >= #dateFrom#
AND photographdate <= #dateTo#
AND licvalid <= #licValid#
LIMIT 0,1000

INNER JOIN categoryholder ON mediaobject.ivid = categoryholder.ivid INNER JOIN acldata ON acldata.objectid = categoryholder.categoryid AND (objecttype = 10 OR objecttype = 11) AND principalid = 0 AND permission = "read"
DELETE FROM searchtmp WHERE searchtime < DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 30 MINUTE)
